item.title: OpenAI 被指「偷换模型」，神秘新模型曝光
item.guid: OpenAI-被指「偷换模型」，神秘新模型曝光
item.description:
Recently, a user named "Lex ( @xw33bttv )" posted on the X platform, claiming that OpenAI has quietly launched a new model called "GPT-5-Chat-Safety," which does not appear in FAQs, API documentation, or terms of service. 日前，一名叫「Lex（ @xw33bttv ）」的用户在 X 平台上发文，声称 OpenAI 已经悄然上线一款名为「GPT-5-Chat-Safety」的新模型，该模型并未出现在 FAQ、API 文档或服务条款中。

According to the description, when users input emotionally charged content into GPT-4o, the original response is ignored and replaced with a version generated by "GPT-5-Chat-Safety." 据描述，当用户在 GPT-4o 中输入带有情感背景的内容时，原始回复会被忽略并替换为由「GPT-5-Chat-Safety」生成的版本。

Whether it's expressions involving emotions like "I had a terrible day" or "I love you," this mechanism will be triggered. 无论是「我今天过得很糟」、还是「我也爱你」等涉及情绪的表达，都会触发这一机制。

The leaker pointed out that this model might have originally been designed for crisis intervention scenarios, but this replacement mechanism is extremely opaque and even widely applied in ordinary conversations, leading users to be switched to the new model without their knowledge. 爆料者指出，这一模型最初可能是为危机干预场景设计，但这一替换机制极不透明，甚至被广泛应用于普通对话中，导致用户在不知情的情况下被切换至新模型。

Some netizens even commented that merely sending a simple "Hello" resulted in the model being replaced. 甚至，有网友在评论指出，只是发送了一个简单的「你好」就被替换模型。

More concerning is that the system does not actively notify users that they have been switched, which outsiders believe may involve consumer rights issues. 更令人担忧的是，系统不会主动提示用户已被切换，外界认为这可能涉及消费者权益问题。

From actual experience, "GPT-5-Chat-Safety"'s responses are more concise and tend to use a formalized narrative style rather than natural one-on-one conversation. 从实际体验来看，「GPT-5-Chat-Safety」的回答更为简短，并倾向于使用格式化的叙述方式，而非自然的 1 对 1 对话。

Lex stated bluntly that this model is "much worse" than GPT-5 and pointed out that this behavior violates consumer law in some countries and regions. Lex 直言，这款模型比 GPT-5「要差得多」，并指出这一行为在一些国家和地区违反了消费者法。

In response, Nick Turley, OpenAI's VP and Head of ChatGPT Applications, issued a statement on the X platform yesterday, acknowledging that OpenAI is testing a new safety routing system. 对此，OpenAI 副总裁兼 ChatGPT 应用主管 Nick Turley 昨日在 X 平台上发表声明，承认 OpenAI 正在测试新的安全路由系统。

He explained that when conversations involve sensitive and emotional topics, the system switches to a reasoning model or GPT-5 specifically designed to rigorously handle such situations. 他解释称，当对话涉及敏感和情感话题时，系统会切换至专门设计用于严谨处理此类情景的推理模型或 GPT-5。

item.title: 雷军解读汽车高定服务：让更多人体验到百万豪车的定制服务
item.guid: 雷军解读汽车高定服务：让更多人体验到百万豪车的定制服务
item.description:
This morning, Lei Jun, Chairman and CEO of Xiaomi Group, posted on Weibo to elaborate on the recently launched Xiaomi EV high-end customization service. 今日早晨，小米集团董事长、CEO 雷军在微博发文，针对日前推出的小米汽车高定服务作出解读。

Lei Jun stated that this service, previously exclusive to top luxury car brands, representing expense, complexity, and ultimate design, has now been introduced by Xiaomi to promote "technological equality and experience equality." 雷军表示，这一服务以往仅存在于顶级豪华汽车品牌，代表着昂贵、复杂与极致的设计，如今被小米引入，以推动「科技平权、体验平权」。

Lei Jun stated that Xiaomi's customization service targets individuals with "unique taste, distinct aesthetics, and a pursuit of self-expression," allowing users to achieve a personalized customization experience comparable to million-dollar luxury cars. 雷军表示，小米定制服务面向「有独特品味、审美鲜明、追求自我表达」的人群，通过该服务，用户可获得媲美百万豪车的个性化定制体验。

According to the introduction, Xiaomi's customization service will offer: 据介绍，小米定制服务将提供：

    Diverse choices akin to ultra-luxury brands, satisfying personalized aesthetic demands;

    Top-tier materials and exquisite craftsmanship, restoring premium colors and designs;

    Exclusive customization service centers, providing a car viewing and purchasing experience close to ultra-luxury brands.

Lei Jun emphasized that Xiaomi hopes this initiative will allow more people to enjoy the high-end customization experience previously exclusive to luxury car owners, bringing more possibilities to Xiaomi EV's design. 雷军强调，小米希望通过这一举措，让更多人享受到过去只属于豪车用户的高端定制体验，为小米汽车的设计带来更多可能性。

According to previous reports, the Xiaomi EV high-end customization service officially debuted at Lei Jun's annual speech and Xiaomi Autumn New Product Launch on September 25th, commencing a one-year trial operation with a maximum of 40 customized vehicles per month, including various customization options. 据此前报道，小米汽车高定服务于 9 月 25 日的雷军年度演讲暨小米秋季新品发布会正式亮相，并开启为期一年的试运营，每月最多定制 40 台，包含多种定制选项。

item.title: 王健林被限制高消费，万达集团此前被强制执行超 4 亿元
item.guid: 王健林被限制高消费，万达集团此前被强制执行超-4-亿元
item.description:
According to Jiupai News and Qichacha APP, Dalian Wanda Group Co., Ltd. and its legal representative Wang Jianlin have recently been restricted from high consumption. 据九派新闻报道、企查查 APP 显示，近日，大连万达集团股份有限公司及其法定代表人王健林等被限制高消费。

Previously, according to Yicai, the China Enforcement Information Disclosure Network showed that Dalian Wanda Group Co., Ltd. had added a new record as an enforced person, with an enforcement target of over 400 million yuan, and the enforcing court was the Beijing Financial Court. 此前，据第一财经报道，中国执行信息公开网显示，大连万达集团股份有限公司新增一则被执行人信息，执行标的超 4 亿元，执行法院为北京金融法院。

Public information shows that Dalian Wanda Group was established in September 1992 with a registered capital of 1 billion yuan and Wang Jianlin as its legal representative. 公开资料显示，大连万达集团成立于 1992 年 9 月，注册资本 10 亿元人民币，法定代表人为王健林。

Shareholder information shows that the company is jointly held by Dalian Hexing Investment Co., Ltd. and Wang Jianlin. 股东信息显示，该公司由大连合兴投资有限公司与王健林共同持股。

Risk information shows that the company currently has multiple records as an enforced person, with a total enforced amount exceeding 5.3 billion yuan, and its equity in several subsidiaries has been frozen. 风险信息显示，该公司现存多条被执行人记录，被执行总金额超过 53 亿元，且所持多家子公司股权已被冻结。

In addition, Beijing Wanda Cultural Industry Group Co., Ltd. added 1 equity freeze information, with Dalian Wanda Group Co., Ltd. as the enforced person, and the frozen equity amount is 8 billion yuan. 此外，北京万达文化产业集团有限公司新增 1 条股权冻结信息，被执行人为大连万达集团股份有限公司，冻结股权数额为 80 亿元。

According to Cailian Press, a Wanda insider responded that Wang Jianlin's high consumption restriction this time may be due to information asymmetry at the enforcement level. 据财联社报道，万达知情人士对此回应称，本次王健林被限高或是执行层面信息不对称所致。

This was caused by an economic dispute involving a Wanda subsidiary project company. In fact, both parties had been negotiating to resolve it through various means, and we are currently understanding the specific situation. This may be due to information asymmetry at the enforcement level.

Wang Jianlin's suggestion to entrepreneurs in a 2016 interview, "First set a small achievable goal, for example, I'll earn 100 million first," left a deep impression on many people. 王健林曾在 2016 年的一次采访中建议创业者「先设定一个能达到的小目标，比方说我先挣它一个亿」给许多人留下了深刻印象。

However, after the news of the "high consumption restriction" broke, some netizens joked, "He has now achieved a loss of dozens of small goals." 然而，「限高」消息传出后，有网友调侃道，「他现在实现了亏损几十个小目标」。

item.title: 错失 OpenAI 早期投资，黄仁勋：我们太穷了，没投够
item.guid: 错失-OpenAI-早期投资，黄仁勋：我们太穷了，没投够
item.description:
Recently, in a latest interview with BG2, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang reflected on his relationship with OpenAI, admitting deep regrets about his early investment decisions. 近日，在与 BG2 的最新访谈中，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋回顾了与 OpenAI 的关系，坦言自己早年在投资决策上留下了深深的遗憾。

He mentioned that when OpenAI invited Nvidia to participate in early investment, Nvidia had limited funds and didn't bet enough: "They invited us to invest at the time, but we were too poor and didn't invest enough. I should have given them all my money." 他提到，当 OpenAI 邀请英伟达参与早期投资时，英伟达资金有限，没有下足赌注：「他们当时邀请我们投资，但我们太穷了，没有投够。我应该把所有的钱都给他们。」

Huang Renxun frankly stated that OpenAI is highly likely to become the next "multi-trillion-dollar hyperscale company," which makes him even more emotional about his conservatism and hesitation back then. 黄仁勋直言，OpenAI 未来极有可能成为下一个「多万亿美元级别的超大规模公司」，这也让他更加感慨当年的保守与犹豫。

He emphasized that missing early investment opportunities is regrettable, but through deep cooperation today, Nvidia can still play an important role in OpenAI's growth. 他强调，错失早期投资机会是令人惋惜的，但如今通过深度合作，英伟达仍能在 OpenAI 的成长中扮演重要角色。

It is reported that Nvidia and OpenAI are engaged in multi-level cooperation, including computing power construction for Microsoft Azure, Oracle OCI, CoreWeave, and the newly announced "Stargate" project. 据悉，英伟达与 OpenAI 正在展开多层次合作，包括微软 Azure、Oracle OCI、CoreWeave 的算力建设，以及最新宣布的「星际之门（Stargate）」项目。

The project is expected to have an investment scale of up to 100 billion US dollars. OpenAI will build its AI infrastructure for the first time, and Nvidia will fully participate at the chip, software, and system levels. 该项目预计投资规模高达 1000 亿美元，OpenAI 将首次自建 AI 基础设施，英伟达则在芯片、软件与系统层面全面参与。

item.title: 面世 21 年，「越狱神器」91 助手停止服务
item.guid: 面世-21-年，「越狱神器」91-助手停止服务
item.description:
Yesterday, the classic Apple iPhone / iPad device management tool "91 Assistant" officially ceased all services. 昨天，经典苹果 iPhone / iPad 设备管理工具「91 助手」正式全面停止所有服务。

Currently, its client can no longer be launched, and functions such as mobile phone connection, file transfer, application management, and VIP exclusive features have all been terminated. At the same time, the official website, help center, and customer service channels have also been closed. 目前，其客户端已无法启动，手机连接、文件传输、应用管理以及 VIP 专属功能等均已终止。同时，官方网站、帮助中心及客服渠道也已同步关闭。

The official announcement states that after the service termination, all user data in "91 Assistant" will be permanently lost and cannot be recovered in any way. 官方公告显示，服务终止后，用户在「91 助手」中的所有数据将永久丢失，无法再以任何方式找回。

It is understood that "91 Assistant" can be traced back to 2007, developed by the NetDragon company team, and was originally named "91 Mobile Assistant." 据了解，「91 助手」最早可追溯至 2007 年，由网龙公司团队开发，最初命名为「91 手机助手」。

In the early stages when the iOS ecosystem was relatively closed and iTunes was inconvenient to use, this tool quickly became popular with features like "jailbreaking," app installation, and file management, earning it the title "jailbreak artifact" among Apple fans. 在 iOS 生态相对封闭、iTunes 使用不便的早期阶段，该工具凭借「越狱」、应用安装和文件管理等功能迅速走红，被果粉称为「越狱神器」。

In 2009, "91 Assistant" expanded to the Android platform, adding features like flashing and mobile phone management, further broadening its user base. 2009 年，「91 助手」拓展至 Android 平台，新增刷机和手机管理功能，进一步扩大用户群体。

At its peak in 2013, its user base on both iOS and Android platforms exceeded 100 million, with total downloads surpassing 10 billion. 2013 年达到巅峰时，其在 iOS 与 Android 平台的用户数超过 1 亿，总下载量突破 100 亿。

In the same year, Baidu acquired 91 Wireless for US$1.9 billion (approximately RMB 13.564 billion), making it one of the largest acquisition deals in China's internet industry at the time. 同年，百度以 19 亿美元（约合人民币 135.64 亿元）收购 91 无线，这一交易成为当时中国互联网行业规模最大的收购案之一。

However, with the evolution of the mobile ecosystem, "91 Assistant" gradually faded from public view. 然而，随着移动生态的演进，「91 助手」逐渐淡出公众视野。

In February 2020, Baidu announced the discontinuation of "91 Assistant" and Android Market, though some functions remained operational. Now, with the complete shutdown, this once popular tool has officially come to an end. 2020 年 2 月，百度宣布下线「91 助手」及安卓市场，但部分功能仍在运行。如今，随着全面停服，这款曾经风靡一时的工具彻底画上句号。

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro 首次用于美国职业棒球赛事转播
item.guid: iPhone-17-Pro-首次用于美国职业棒球赛事转播
item.description:
According to 9to5Mac, Major League Baseball (MLB)'s "Friday Night Baseball" game last week saw a new attempt: using the iPhone 17 Pro for live broadcast filming of official events. 据 9to5Mac 报道，美国职业棒球大联盟（MLB）上周的「Friday Night Baseball」比赛迎来一项全新尝试：将 iPhone 17 Pro 用于官方赛事的现场转播拍摄。

According to reports, for the game between the Detroit Tigers and the Boston Red Sox held at Fenway Park, the production team deployed a total of 4 iPhone 17 Pros, located in positions such as the home dugout, the top of the "Green Monster" wall in left field, and even including a wireless mobile camera. 据介绍，本场在芬威球场举行的底特律老虎队与波士顿红袜队的比赛中，制作团队共部署了 4 部 iPhone 17 Pro，分别位于主队休息区、左外野「绿色怪物」高墙顶部等位置，甚至还包括一台无线移动机位。

When the footage switches to iPhone capture, a "Shot on iPhone" logo will appear in the upper right corner of the broadcast screen. 当画面切换至 iPhone 拍摄时，转播画面右上角会出现「Shot on iPhone」标识。

Apple stated that all devices are paired with the Blackmagic Camera app and Blackmagic Camera ProDock accessory, supporting remote adjustment of exposure, white balance, and zoom. 苹果方面表示，所有设备均搭配 Blackmagic Camera 应用与 Blackmagic Camera ProDock 配件，支持远程调整曝光、白平衡和变焦。

This attempt is part of Apple's collaboration with MLB. Previously, both parties had introduced innovative methods such as drone aerial photography, helmet cameras, and "Megalodon" ultra-high-definition cameras into game broadcasts. 此次尝试是苹果与 MLB 合作的一部分。此前，双方已在赛事转播中引入无人机航拍、头盔摄像机和「Megalodon」超高清机位等创新手段。

Apple stated that this experimental application has been secretly prepared for several months and may further expand the application scenarios of iPhone in professional broadcasting in the future. 苹果称，本次实验性应用已秘密筹备数月，未来或将进一步拓展 iPhone 在专业转播中的应用场景。

item.title: 西贝贾国龙多平台清空账号，仅留一条视频作品
item.guid: 西贝贾国龙多平台清空账号，仅留一条视频作品
item.description:
Jia Guolong, founder of Xibei Catering, recently cleared his account content on multiple social media platforms. 西贝餐饮创始人贾国龙近期在多个社交平台清空了账号内容。

Currently, his Douyin account only retains one public video, published on September 30, 2024, titled "Big Bear's Exclusive Interview with Jia Guolong." 目前，其抖音账号仅保留一条公开视频，发布时间为 2024 年 9 月 30 日，内容为「大熊专访贾国龙」。

In the video, Jia Guolong reviewed the development history of Xibei Catering, calling Xibei "a leader in the Northwest cuisine field" and revealing that the company's annual revenue has reached 6.2 billion yuan. 在视频中，贾国龙回顾了西贝餐饮的发展历程，称西贝是「西北菜领域的佼佼者」，并透露公司年营收已达 62 亿元。

Meanwhile, Jia Guolong's account content on Xiaohongshu and Video Accounts has been completely cleared. 与此同时，贾国龙在小红书和视频号的账号内容已全部清空。

Previously, Xibei was pushed into the spotlight due to Luo Yonghao's complaints about pre-made dishes. Jia Guolong initially responded strongly, threatening to sue and emphasizing in a live broadcast that "not a single dish is pre-made." However, after stores were exposed for using long-shelf-life frozen ingredients, facing more doubts, his attitude later shifted to admitting "the response was wrong, and we will change." 此前，西贝因罗永浩吐槽预制菜问题被推上风口浪尖，贾国龙最初强硬回应并扬言起诉、在直播间强调「没有一道菜是预制菜」，但因门店被曝使用长保质期冷冻食材，遭更多质疑，后续态度转为承认「应对方式有错，改」。

On September 15, Xibei issued an apology letter, admitting a gap between its production process and customer expectations, and stating that it would strive to shift the pre-processing steps from the central kitchen to on-site completion at the stores. 9 月 15 日，西贝发布致歉信，承认生产工艺与顾客期望存在差距，并表示将尽可能把中央厨房的前置加工环节调整到门店现场完成。

On September 23, Xibei again sparked controversy due to a PR article that told a story from a child's perspective about "insisting on eating Xibei as promised," which netizens criticized as "epic failure" PR. 9 月 23 日，西贝又因一篇以一名儿童的口吻讲述「坚持守约吃西贝」故事的公关文章引发争议，网友批其为「史诗级拉垮」公关。

item.title: 摩尔线程成功过会，手握 20 亿订单
item.guid: 摩尔线程成功过会，手握-20-亿订单
item.description:
According to 21st Century Business Herald, domestic GPU manufacturer Moore Threads successfully entered the review stage just 88 days after disclosing its prospectus. The Listing Review Committee of the Shanghai Stock Exchange determined that the company meets the conditions for issuance and listing. 据 21 世纪经济报道，国产 GPU 厂商摩尔线程在披露招股书仅 88 天后，顺利进入上会阶段。上海证券交易所上市审核委员会认定，公司符合发行与上市条件。

Financial data shows that Moore Threads' operating revenue reached 438 million yuan in 2024, a significant year-on-year increase; 财务数据显示，摩尔线程 2024 年营业收入达 4.38 亿元，同比增长显著；

In the first half of 2025, revenue further increased to 702 million yuan, a substantial year-on-year increase of 238.71% and a quarter-on-quarter increase of 203.44%. Concurrently, net loss narrowed to 271 million yuan, a year-on-year decrease of 56.02%. The company's gross profit margin also improved from -70.08% in 2022 to 70.71% in 2024. 2025 年上半年收入进一步增至 7.02 亿元，同比大增 238.71%，环比增长 203.44%。同期净亏损收窄至 2.71 亿元，同比下降 56.02%。公司毛利率也从 2022 年的 -70.08% 提升至 2024 年的 70.71%。

At the product level, Moore Threads has successively launched four generations of GPU architectures: "Sudi," "Chunxiao," "Quyuan," and "Pinghu," with "Pinghu" achieving commercialization in 2024, becoming the core driver of revenue growth. 在产品层面，摩尔线程已连续推出「苏堤」「春晓」「曲院」「平湖」四代 GPU 架构，其中「平湖」在 2024 年实现商业化，成为推动收入增长的核心动力。

The company expects future revenue to continue to primarily come from AI intelligent computing products, with smart SoC products also maintaining rapid growth. 该公司预计未来收入仍将主要来自 AI 智算产品，智能 SoC 产品也将保持快速增长。

Regarding orders, as of September 5, Moore Threads has outstanding orders totaling approximately 2 billion yuan , with AI intelligent computing business accounting for the largest share, expected to be gradually fulfilled between 2025 and 2026. 订单方面，截至 9 月 5 日，摩尔线程在手订单金额约 20 亿元 ，其中 AI 智算业务占比最大，预计将在 2025 年至 2026 年逐步兑现。

The company revealed that the performance of some of its products has reached or exceeded the level of Nvidia RTX 3060 and RTX 4060. 公司透露，部分产品性能已达到或超过英伟达 RTX 3060 与 RTX 4060 的水平。

item.title: 俄罗斯公布国产 EUV 光刻设备长期路线图，目标 2037 年实现亚 10nm 制程
item.guid: 俄罗斯公布国产-EUV-光刻设备长期路线图，目标-2037-年实现亚-10nm-制程
item.description:
According to tom’s HARDWARE, the Institute of Microstructure Physics of the Russian Academy of Sciences recently unveiled its latest roadmap for domestically produced extreme ultraviolet (EUV) lithography equipment, spanning from 2026 to 2037, with the goal of gradually replacing DUV technology and achieving sub-10nm processes. 据 tom’s HARDWARE 报道，俄罗斯科学院微结构物理研究所近日公布了最新的国产极紫外（EUV）光刻设备路线图，规划时间跨度从 2026 年至 2037 年，目标是逐步替代 DUV 技术并实现亚 10nm 制程。

According to the roadmap, R&D is divided into three phases: 根据路线图，研发分为三个阶段：

    2026–2028: Launch of the first lithography machine supporting 40nm process, featuring a dual-mirror design, overlay accuracy of 10nm, and capable of processing over 5 wafers per hour.

    2029–2032: Upgrade to a scanner supporting 28nm (potentially 14nm) process, utilizing a four-mirror system, with overlay accuracy improved to 5nm, and throughput exceeding 50 wafers per hour.

    2033–2036: Aim to achieve sub-10nm process, using a six-mirror design, with overlay accuracy of 2nm, and throughput exceeding 100 wafers per hour.

Unlike ASML's EUV systems, the Russian solution uses a xenon plasma light source and Ru/Be mirrors, operating at a wavelength of 11.2nm. The researchers claim this design avoids debris issues caused by tin droplets, reduces maintenance costs, and simplifies the process flow. 与 ASML 的 EUV 系统不同，俄罗斯方案采用氙等离子体光源和 Ru/Be 镜面，工作波长为 11.2nm。研究方声称，这种设计可避免锡液滴带来的碎屑问题，降低维护成本，并简化工艺流程。

However, industry insiders point out that the 11.2nm wavelength involved in this roadmap is not an industry standard, and related optical components, light sources, and photoresists all need to be redeveloped, making execution extremely difficult. Even if the project proceeds smoothly, its commercialization prospects remain highly uncertain. 不过，业内人士指出，该路线图涉及的 11.2nm 波长并非业界标准，相关光学元件、光源和光刻胶等环节均需重新开发，执行难度极高。即便项目顺利推进，其商业化前景仍存在较大不确定性。

item.title: GitHub 或被澳大利亚列为「危害未成年人的社交平台」
item.guid: GitHub-或被澳大利亚列为「危害未成年人的社交平台」
item.description:
According to Cybernews, the Australian eSafety Commissioner recently sent a formal letter to the open-source code-sharing platform GitHub, requesting it to consider whether it should be classified as a "social media platform" that could harm minors. 据 Cybernews 报道，澳大利亚电子安全委员会（eSafety Commissioner）近日向开源代码共享平台 GitHub 发出正式函件，要求其考虑自身是否应被归类为可能危害未成年人的「社交媒体平台」。

Under new regulations set to take effect in Australia on December 10, teenagers under 16 will be prohibited from using specific social media platforms deemed harmful to children. 根据澳大利亚将于 12 月 10 日起生效的新规，16 岁以下青少年将被禁止使用被认定对儿童有害的特定社交媒体平台。

Currently, mainstream platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Snapchat, YouTube, and X are already on the regulatory list. 目前，Facebook、Instagram、TikTok、Snapchat、YouTube 和 X 等主流平台已在监管名单之列。

eSafety Commissioner Julie Inman Grant stated in an interview with ABC News, "The situation with some platforms is clear, but we still need to conduct due diligence." 电子安全专员朱莉・伊曼・格兰特（Julie Inman Grant）在接受 ABC News 采访时表示：「有些平台的情况很明确，但我们仍需进行尽职调查。」

It is worth noting that GitHub has long been not only a toolkit for developer collaboration but has also been reported to host malicious software, phishing tools, and other content, raising regulatory concerns. 值得注意的是，GitHub 长期以来不仅是开发者协作的工具库，也被曝出曾托管恶意软件、钓鱼工具等内容，引发监管担忧。

However, this move has also sparked controversy online, with many users sarcastically remarking that "children who want to learn programming might have to leave Australia." 但此举也在网络上引发争议，不少用户讽刺称「孩子们想学编程可能得离开澳大利亚」。

Currently, eSafety has issued "self-assessment" requests to 16 platforms, including Roblox, Reddit, Discord, Steam, and Twitch. If companies wish to be exempt, they need to submit sufficient reasons and evidence. 目前，eSafety 已向包括 Roblox、Reddit、Discord、Steam、Twitch 在内的 16 家平台发出「自我评估」要求，若企业希望豁免，需要提交充分理由和证据。

Regulators also revealed that the scope of the investigation might expand to include approximately 100 platforms. 监管机构同时透露，调查范围可能扩展至约 100 个平台。

item.title: 彭博社：美国卖得最好的车是二手电动车
item.guid: 彭博社：美国卖得最好的车是二手电动车
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, the U.S. used electric vehicle market is rapidly heating up. 据彭博社报道，美国二手电动车市场正在快速升温。

Data from Cox Automotive shows that used EV sales grew by 34% year-on-year in the first half of this year, with the average selling price reaching $34,700 in August, almost on par with gasoline-powered vehicles. Cox Automotive 的数据显示，今年上半年二手电动车销量同比增长 34%，平均售价在 8 月达到 34,700 美元，几乎与燃油车持平。

The report points out that multiple factors are driving this trend: 报道指出，多重因素推动了这一趋势：

    A large number of EV lease contracts purchased in 2022 are expiring, significantly increasing market supply;

    Used EV prices continue to fall, with depreciation generally higher than that of gasoline-powered vehicles;

    The advantages of electric vehicles in terms of reliability and maintenance costs are gradually becoming apparent.

For example, a brand new Ford Mustang Mach-E GT cost about $55,000 a year ago, while a used one, only 1 year old and with 13,000 miles, is priced at just $33,000, a depreciation of 22%. 例如，一辆全新福特 Mustang Mach-E GT 在一年前售价约 55,000 美元，而一辆仅使用 1 年、行驶 13,000 英里的二手车，售价仅为 33,000 美元，折价幅度达到 22%。

Liz Najman, Director of Market Insights at Recurrent, said: "EVs from three years ago still offer long range, fast charging, and rich features, which makes consumers more willing to choose used models." Recurrent 市场洞察总监 Liz Najman 表示：「三年前的电动车如今依然具备较长续航、快速充电和丰富配置，这让消费者更愿意选择二手车型。」

Furthermore, some brands' used EVs are even cheaper than comparable gasoline-powered cars. For example, the average used price of a 2023 Toyota bZ4X is $6,600 lower than that of a gasoline-powered RAV4 from the same year. 此外，部分品牌的二手电动车甚至比同级燃油车更便宜。例如，2023 款丰田 bZ4X 的二手均价比同年份的燃油版 RAV4 低 6,600 美元。

Cox Automotive data shows that the average inventory turnover period for used EVs in the U.S. is currently only 36 days, compared to 42 days for gasoline-powered vehicles. This means used EVs are becoming a mainstream choice for more consumers. Cox Automotive 数据显示，目前美国二手电动车的平均库存消化周期仅为 36 天，而燃油车为 42 天。这意味着二手电动车正在成为更多消费者的主流选择。

item.title: 法拉第未来官宣 FF 91 2.0 新车主
item.guid: 法拉第未来官宣-FF-91-2.0-新车主
item.description:
Yesterday, Faraday Future (FF) posted on Weibo, officially announcing a new owner for the FF 91 2.0. 昨天，法拉第未来（Faraday Future，FF）在微博发文，官宣 FF 91 2.0 再迎新车主。

The official statement said that the company will complete the delivery procedures for an FF 91 2.0 this Friday at its Los Angeles headquarters. The owner is Calvin Gong, president of the real estate company Pinnacle Real Estate Group, and a delivery celebration ceremony will be held on October 8th. 官方表示，公司将于本周五在洛杉矶总部完成一台 FF 91 2.0 的交付手续，车主为地产公司 Pinnacle Real Estate Group 的总裁 Calvin Gong，并将在 10 月 8 日举行交车庆祝仪式。

According to reports, Pinnacle is one of the largest Chinese-American real estate brokerage firms in Southern California, currently operating three branches and employing over 1,000 real estate agents. 据介绍，Pinnacle 是南加州最大的华裔房产经纪公司之一，目前运营三家分公司，拥有超过 1000 名房地产经纪人。

Following this delivery, Calvin Gong and Pinnacle will also become FF's co-creation officers. 此次交付后，Calvin Gong 及 Pinnacle 也将成为 FF 的共创官。

The article also mentioned that the collaboration between the two parties has pioneered the world's first "B2B2C" model, deeply integrating AIEV with the real estate brokerage industry. Leveraging Pinnacle's real estate network, they aim to create an asset-light, co-creation and sharing, and rapidly scalable user acquisition platform. 文中还提到，双方合作开创了全球首创的「B2B2C」模式，将 AIEV 与房产经纪产业深度融合，依托 Pinnacle 的地产网络，打造轻资产、共创共享和快速放量的用户获取平台。

Jia Yueting, founder and Co-CEO of FF, stated: "Calvin Gong is a respected entrepreneur and industry leader, and his becoming an FF 91 2.0 owner once again validates the vision and value embodied by this vehicle." FF 创始人、Co-CEO 贾跃亭表示：「Calvin Gong 是倍受尊敬的企业家与行业领袖，他成为 FF 91 2.0 车主再次印证了这款车所承载的愿景与价值。」

Calvin Gong responded: "We are proud to partner with FF to jointly lead a new model of cross-industry collaboration. This cooperation will undoubtedly bring a brand new experience to both the real estate brokerage and mobility industries." Calvin Gong 则回应称：「我们很自豪能够与 FF 携手，共同引领跨界合作的新模式。这次合作必将带来房产经纪产业与出行产业的全新体验。」

Jia Yueting also posted on social media: "Buy car and house together, co-create and win-win," emphasizing the strategic significance of the "luxury car + luxury home" model. 贾跃亭还在社交平台发文：「车房同购，共创共赢」，强调「豪车+豪宅」模式的战略意义。

item.title: 追觅汽车七项专利遭质疑
item.guid: 追觅汽车七项专利遭质疑
item.description:
Previously, Zhumi Auto's official Weibo stated that it "reconstructed an unordered opposing car door with 7 globally pioneering patents." The "7 patents" mentioned in the article have recently been questioned online. 此前，追觅汽车官方微博称，其「以全球首创 7 项专利，重构一个无序对开的车门」，文中提到的「7 项专利」近日遭到网络质疑。

According to patent disclosure information, these 7 patents all revolve around "pillarless suicide doors," involving key designs such as door hinge structures and drive mechanisms. 据专利公开信息显示，这 7 项专利均围绕「无 B 柱对开门」展开，涉及车门铰链结构、驱动机构等关键设计。

However, an article from the WeChat official account "Patent Digger" pointed out that the 7 patents mentioned by Roborock only have 3 inventors but are equipped with as many as 7 agents, which it described as "Royal VIP service." 而微信公众号「专利挖掘机」的一篇文章则指出，追觅提到的 7 项专利仅有 3 位发明人，却配备了多达 7 位代理人，被其形容为「皇家 VIP 服务」。

From a technical principle perspective, Roborock's solution addresses the opening and closing sequence problem of pillarless doors by using a "first translate, then rotate" method, allowing the front and rear doors to open independently and avoiding the traditional design's restriction of having to open the front door before the rear door. 从技术原理来看，追觅的方案通过「先平移、再转动」的方式解决了无 B 柱车门的开合顺序问题，使前后门可独立开启，避免了传统设计中必须先开前门再开后门的限制。

This approach is reflected in patent documents such as CN119749192A, CN119593649A, and CN119711868A. 该思路在专利 CN119749192A、CN119593649A、CN119711868A 等文件中均有体现。

However, the article points out that similar designs are not new. 不过，文章指出，类似设计并非首次出现。

As early as 2006, Ford had applied for related patents; in 2024, Geely's Zeekr MIX model also adopted a pillarless structure and claimed it as a "global first." 早在 2006 年，福特就曾申请过相关专利；2024 年，吉利旗下极氪 MIX 车型也采用了无 B 柱结构，并宣称为「全球首创」。

Geely's patent number is CN220621505U, and its agency overlaps with Roborock's agency team. 吉利的专利号为 CN220621505U，其代理机构与追觅的代理团队存在重合。

In addition, Roborock showcased the complete vehicle designs of a sports car and an SUV in its patent drawings, and its CEO, Yu Hao, even stated directly in an internal meeting that they "benchmark Bugatti Veyron" and "crush Li Auto L9." 此外，追觅在专利附图中展示了跑车与 SUV 的整车造型，其 CEO 俞浩在一次内部会议上甚至直言「对标布加迪威龙」「碾压理想 L9」。

Currently, Roborock Auto has not yet announced a specific timetable for mass-produced models. 目前，追觅汽车尚未公布量产车型的具体时间表。

item.title: 宝马因部件安全隐患召回超 33 万辆汽车
item.guid: 宝马因部件安全隐患召回超-33-万辆汽车
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, Germany's BMW Group announced it would recall over 330,000 vehicles due to potential short-circuit risks in the starter and related components. 据新华社报道，德国宝马集团宣布将召回超过 33 万辆汽车，原因是起动机及相关部件可能存在短路隐患。

In the German market, this recall affects over 130,000 vehicles, including multiple models produced between September 2015 and September 2021. 在德国市场，此次召回涉及超过 13 万辆汽车，生产时间为 2015 年 9 月至 2021 年 9 月的多款车型。

BMW has not yet announced the total global recall number, but industry insiders expect the actual scale to exceed the disclosed figures. 宝马方面尚未公布全球召回总数，但业内预计实际规模或将超过已披露的数字。

Additionally, according to an announcement from the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, BMW will recall nearly 200,000 vehicles produced between 2019 and 2022 in the region. 另据美国国家公路交通安全管理局公告，宝马将在当地召回近 20 万辆 2019 年至 2022 年生产的车型。

The agency noted that the "starter relay in affected vehicles may corrode, leading to overheating and short-circuiting of the relay," posing a risk of fire . 该机构指出，受影响车辆的「起动机继电器可能发生腐蚀，从而导致继电器过热并短路」， 存在引发火灾风险 。

It is understood that recalled vehicles will have their starters replaced, and some models will also require the installation of more powerful batteries, with the cumulative cost expected to be high. 据了解，召回车辆将更换起动机，部分车型还需安装功率更大的电池，预计累计成本较高。

item.title: 马斯克官宣特斯拉 FSD V14 下周推送，称车会变得「富有灵性」
item.guid: 马斯克官宣特斯拉-FSD-V14-下周推送，称车会变得「富有灵性」
item.description:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk recently announced the rollout plan for FSD V14 on X. 特斯拉 CEO Elon Musk 近日在 X 上公布了 FSD V14 的推送计划。

According to the plan, Tesla will gradually release versions V14, V14.1, and V14.2 in three phases. 按照安排，特斯拉将分三个阶段，逐步发布 V14、V14.1 和 V14.2 版本。

Musk stated that next week's launch will be an "early wide release" of FSD V14, primarily targeting internal employees, test program members, and some industry professionals. 马斯克表示，下周启动的将是 FSD V14 的「早期广泛发布」，主要面向内部员工、测试计划成员以及部分行业人士。

V14.1 is expected to go live approximately two weeks after the initial release, focusing on fixing early issues and potentially becoming the first version available to the general public. V14.1 预计在初版发布约两周后上线，重点修复早期问题，并有望成为首个面向大众车主的版本。

As for V14.2, Musk did not give a clear timeline but emphasized that the experience would undergo a "qualitative change," even making the system feel "spiritual." 至于 V14.2，马斯克未给出明确时间，但强调届时体验将迎来「质变」，甚至让人感觉系统「富有灵性」。

This V14 has been called FSD's 'second largest update in history' by Musk, with its core being a comprehensive upgrade at the architectural level. 此次 V14 被马斯克称为 FSD「历史上第二大更新」，核心在于架构层面的全面升级。

The new version adopts a larger neural network model, with a 10-fold increase in parameters, while also reducing video data compression, allowing the vehicle to 'see more clearly' and thus improving judgment accuracy. 新版本采用规模更大的神经网络模型，参数量提升 10 倍，同时降低视频数据压缩率，使车辆「看得更清晰」，从而提升判断精度。

Additionally, the V14 series may also introduce features previously previewed in V13.2.9, including audio recognition of emergency vehicles, optimization of 'phantom braking,' and more. However, the highly anticipated 'destination auto-parking' feature, which users have been calling for, was not included in this preview. 此外，V14 系列还可能引入此前在 V13.2.9 中预告的功能，包括音频识别紧急车辆、优化「幽灵刹车」等。不过，用户呼声较高的「目的地自动泊车」功能并未出现在此次预告中。

item.title: 印度首批 Model Y 正式交付，全部来自上海超级工厂
item.guid: 印度首批-Model-Y-正式交付，全部来自上海超级工厂
item.description:

It is reported that Tesla's first showroom in India opened in July this year, marking the company's official entry into the Indian market. Concurrently, the official pricing for the Model Y in India was announced: 据悉，特斯拉在印度的首家展厅于今年 7 月开业，标志着该公司正式进入印度市场。与此同时，官方公布了 Model Y 在印度的售价：

On the same day, Tesla's official account reposted this Weibo post with the caption: 'Congratulations to the new car owners in India on receiving their beloved cars 🚗 Products from the Shanghai Gigafactory are absolutely top-notch 🦾'. 当天，特斯拉官方账号转发了这条微博，并配文「恭喜印度的新车主们喜提爱车🚗来自上海超级工厂的产品绝对杠杠的🦾」。

item.title: 💡 机器人专家：人形机器人的投资泡沫必将破裂
item.guid: 💡-机器人专家：人形机器人的投资泡沫必将破裂
item.description:
According to techcrunch, renowned roboticist Rodney Brooks recently published an article stating bluntly that the current frenzied investment by capital markets in humanoid robot startups 'is a waste of money'. 据 techcrunch 报道，知名机器人学家 Rodney Brooks 近日发表文章，直言当前资本市场对人形机器人初创企业的狂热投资「是在浪费资金」。

Brooks co-founded iRobot and conducted decades of research at MIT. Brooks 曾共同创立 iRobot，并在麻省理工学院从事数十年研究。

He stated that some companies attempting to teach robots dexterous movements by having them watch human operation videos is 'pure fantasy thinking'. 他表示，部分企业试图通过让机器人观看人类操作视频来学习灵巧动作，这种做法是「纯粹的幻想（pure fantasy thinking）」。

He emphasized that human hands are extremely complex, possessing approximately 17,000 tactile receptors, a level far from what existing robots have achieved. Unlike speech recognition and image processing, haptic data lacks a long-standing research tradition, making breakthroughs extremely difficult. 他强调，人类双手极其复杂，拥有约 17,000 个触觉感受器，而现有机器人远未达到这一水平。与语音识别和图像处理不同，触觉数据缺乏长期积累的研究传统，导致突破难度极大。

Furthermore, Brooks also warned of safety hazards: full-sized humanoid robots require significant energy to maintain balance, and a fall would be extremely dangerous. According to physical laws, a robot that doubles in size will have its potential destructive energy increase by 8 times. 此外，Brooks 还提醒安全隐患：全尺寸的人形机器人需要消耗大量能量维持平衡，一旦跌倒将极具危险。按照物理规律，体型加倍的机器人，其潜在破坏能量将增加至 8 倍。

Brooks believes that truly successful 'human-like' robots within the next 15 years will not be confined to a 'humanoid' form, but will instead adopt wheeled designs, equipped with multiple arms and specialized sensors, to achieve more efficient practicality. He firmly believes that current multi-billion dollar investments will ultimately only become expensive experiments that cannot be scaled. Brooks 认为，未来 15 年内真正成功的「类人」机器人不会拘泥于「人形」，而是采用轮式设计，配备多臂和专用传感器，以实现更高效的实用性。他坚信，当前数十亿美元的投入最终只会沦为无法规模化的昂贵实验。

It's worth noting that Unitree Robotics previously released a video where their G1 robot was 'ganged up on' but still maintained balance and completed consecutive backflips at the end. 值得一提的是，宇树科技此前发表了一条视频，视频中的 G1 机器人被「围殴」，但依旧保持平衡，并在结尾完成连续空翻。

Unitree also stated that even if it falls due to external impact, it can quickly get up and resume its interrupted actions. 宇树官方还表示，即便遭遇外力冲击摔倒，也能迅速起身并衔接被打断的动作。

item.title: 售价 3.5 万元，前苹果首席设计师 Jony Ive 携手 Balmuda 推出便携航海灯
item.guid: 售价-3.5-万元，前苹果首席设计师-Jony-Ive-携手-Balmuda-推出便携航海灯
item.description:
Yesterday, LoveFrom, the design firm founded by former Apple chief designer Jony Ive, announced a collaboration with Japanese brand Balmuda to launch a new portable lighting product, the 'Sailing Lantern'. 昨天，前苹果首席设计师 Jony Ive 旗下设计公司 LoveFrom 与日本品牌 Balmuda 宣布合作，推出全新便携照明产品「Sailing Lantern」。

According to reports, this lamp is inspired by Ive's sailing experiences. Its appearance continues the silhouette of vintage nautical lamps, but in terms of materials and craftsmanship, it uses a precision stainless steel frame and polished textured glass, with an internal LED light source, weighing approximately 1.5kg. 据介绍，这款灯具灵感源自 Ive 的航海经历，外观延续复古航海灯的轮廓，但在材质与工艺上采用精密不锈钢框架与抛光纹理玻璃，内部搭载 LED 光源，重量约 1.5kg。

Ive stated: "I have loved sailing since I was a child, but I could never find a lamp that could be used in extreme maritime conditions. This design is not nostalgic; it stems from human intuition and creativity." Ive 表示：「我从小就热爱航海，但一直找不到能在极端海上环境下使用的灯具。这款设计并非怀旧，而是源于人类的直觉与创造力。」

Gen Terao, founder of Balmuda, added: "When Jony proposed this idea, I found it very romantic. We hope to combine nautical imagery with modern LED technology to create a true tool." Balmuda 创始人寺尾玄补充称：「当 Jony 提出这个想法时，我觉得非常浪漫。我们希望结合航海意象与现代 LED 技术，打造一件真正的工具。」

"Sailing Lantern" supports gradual dimming, with light transitioning from red to bluish-white, simulating the natural effect of burning flames. The lamp body is equipped with a salt spray-resistant, oil-resistant polyester lanyard, and details are secured with anti-corrosion stainless steel. 「Sailing Lantern」支持渐变调光，光线从红色逐渐过渡到蓝白色，模拟火焰燃烧的自然效果。灯体配备耐盐雾、耐油的聚酯挂绳，细节处采用防腐不锈钢固定。

The product is limited to 1000 units, priced at $4800 (approximately 35,000 RMB), and is now available for purchase on Balmuda's official website. 该产品限量 1000 台，售价 4800 美元（约合人民币 3.5 万元），现已在 Balmuda 官网开启发售。

item.title: 第三方厂商让复古卡西欧手表变成「智能手表」，还能玩小游戏
item.guid: 第三方厂商让复古卡西欧手表变成「智能手表」，还能玩小游戏
item.description:
According to The Verge, the classic Casio F-91W digital watch has received its first smart upgrade since its launch 36 years ago, but this is not from the official manufacturer, but rather a replacement mainboard "Ollee Watch One" introduced by third-party vendor Ollee. 据 The Verge 报道，经典的卡西欧 F-91W 数字手表自 36 年前推出以来首次迎来智能化升级，但这并非出自官方之手，而是第三方厂商 Ollee 推出的替换主板「Ollee Watch One」。

According to reports, the "Ollee Watch One" is compatible with multiple models such as F-91W and A158W. Users do not need to solder; installation can be completed by simply removing screws and buckles. 据介绍，「Ollee Watch One」适用于 F-91W、A158W 等多款型号，用户无需焊接，只需拆卸螺丝和卡扣即可完成安装。

After the upgrade, the watch can connect to a mobile app via Bluetooth, enabling features such as automatic time synchronization, step counting, mini-games, and colored backlighting. 升级后，手表可通过蓝牙与手机应用连接，实现自动校时、计步、小游戏以及彩色背光等功能。

The upgraded mainboard features a built-in accelerometer, temperature sensor, and improved LED backlight, supporting world time and 5 timer presets. Users can also experience a simplified version of "Blackjack" and the pinball game "Ping" on the watch. 升级主板内置加速度计、温度传感器和改进的 LED 背光，支持世界时间和 5 个定时预设。用户还可在手表上体验简化版「二十一点」以及弹球游戏「Ping」。

However, the kit does not provide message notification functionality, and the screen still retains its original segmented display. 不过，该套件并未提供消息通知功能，屏幕依旧保持原有的分段式显示。

Regarding pricing, the DIY version costs $54.99 (approximately 392 RMB), requiring users to provide their own compatible watch model; 售价方面，DIY 版本价格为 54.99 美元（约 392 元人民币），需用户自备兼容型号手表；

The pre-installed upgraded F-91W-1 and A158W-1 are priced at $99.99 (approximately 715 RMB), but are currently sold out. 预装升级的 F-91W-1 与 A158W-1 定价 99.99 美元（约 715 元人民币），但目前已售罄。

In terms of battery life, the upgraded watch can last approximately 10 months when using a CR2016 button cell battery, which is lower than the original F-91W-1's 7-year battery life. 电池续航方面，升级后的手表在使用 CR2016 纽扣电池时可维持约 10 个月，低于原版 F-91W-1 的 7 年续航。

item.title: 千里科技完成 AI 战略布局第一步，新品牌「AFARI」正式发布
item.guid: 千里科技完成-AI-战略布局第一步，新品牌「AFARI」正式发布
item.description:
Yesterday, Qianli Technology held the "New Rhyme Chongqing, Qianli Intelligent Driving — AI Chongqing Intelligent Driving Night & Qianli Technology Brand Launch Event" in Chongqing, officially unveiling its new English brand name "AFARI" and brand logo, marking a new stage in the company's AI strategic transformation. 昨天，千里科技在重庆举办「新韵重庆 千里智驾 —— AI 重庆智驾之夜暨千里科技品牌发布会」，正式发布全新品牌英文名「AFARI」及品牌标识，标志着公司 AI 战略转型迈入新阶段。

At the launch event, Yin Qi, Chairman of Qianli Technology, and Li Shufu, Chairman of Geely Holding Group, shared the stage to discuss the integrated development of "AI+Vehicles". 发布会上，千里科技董事长印奇与吉利控股集团董事长李书福同台，围绕「AI+车」的融合发展展开探讨。

Renowned director Xu Zheng appeared as Qianli Intelligent Driving Experience Officer and, together with professional race car driver Ma Qinghua, completed the "Qianli Go 8D" real-world challenge, demonstrating the performance of Qianli's intelligent assisted driving system in Chongqing's complex road conditions. 知名导演徐峥以千里智驾体验官身份亮相，并与职业赛车手马青骅共同完成「千里走 8D」实景挑战，展示了千里智能辅助驾驶系统在重庆复杂路况下的表现。

Qianli Technology stated that since launching its "AI+" strategic transformation last year, the company has completed a comprehensive layout in three major areas: intelligent driving, intelligent cockpit, and intelligent mobility: 千里科技表示，自去年启动「AI+」战略转型以来，公司已在智能驾驶、智能座舱和智能出行三大领域完成全面布局：

    Intelligent Driving : The intelligent driving system, based on large models, has undergone real-world testing on Chongqing's "8D" complex road conditions, demonstrating a safer, smoother, and more AI-driven driving experience.

    Intelligent Cockpit : Launched a new generation of intelligent cockpit Agent OS, supporting hyper-natural interaction, integrated memory, and third living space functionalities.

    Intelligent Mobility : Plans to complete the full-chain industrial layout for Robotaxi within the next 18 months and achieve large-scale operation in 10 cities worldwide.

The new brand "AFARI" is a combination of "Afar" and "I (intelligence)", meaning "With AI, we go far". 新品牌「AFARI」由「Afar（远方）」与「I（智能）」组合而成，寓意「With AI, we go far」。

In addition, Yin Qi also announced the "Qianli Project", proposing a future vision of "One Brain, One OS, One Agent", aiming to build an AI brain and cross-terminal intelligent assistant system driven by large models. 此外，印奇还公布了「千里计划」，提出「One Brain，One OS，One Agent」的未来愿景，旨在构建由大模型驱动的 AI 大脑和跨终端智能助手体系。

At the end of the event, 5,000 drones lit up the night sky of Chongqing, drawing a picture of "AI + Future" and bringing the press conference to a close. 活动最后，5000 架无人机点亮重庆夜空，绘制出「AI + 未来」的图景，为发布会画上句点。

item.title: 一加 15 开启预约，「原色沙丘」配色更多细节公布
item.guid: 一加-15-开启预约，「原色沙丘」配色更多细节公布
item.description:
Yesterday, the OnePlus 15 began pre-orders on JD.com. The new phone features the "Original Dune" color scheme, and also offers "Absolute Black" and "Mist Purple" versions. 昨天，一加 15 在京东开启预约。新机主打「原色沙丘」配色，另提供「绝对黑」与「雾光紫」版本。

According to the official introduction, the OnePlus 15 is the first to feature an "aerospace-grade nano-ceramic metal" frame, claiming to be 26.3% lighter than titanium, with a 134% increase in surface hardness, and a 26.6-fold improvement in heat dissipation performance. 官方介绍称，一加 15 首发「航天级纳米瓷金属」中框，号称比钛金属轻 26.3%，表面硬度提升 134%，散热性能提升 26.6 倍。

In terms of performance, the device will be among the "first batch" to be equipped with the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Ultimate Edition mobile platform. 性能方面，该机将「首批」搭载第五代骁龙 8 至尊版移动平台。

The platform adopts a 2+6 core architecture, with two Prime cores clocked up to 4.6GHz and six performance cores running at 3.62GHz. Compared to its predecessor, CPU performance is increased by 20%, energy efficiency by 35%, and overall power consumption is reduced by 16%. 该平台采用 2+6 核心架构，两个 Prime 核心主频提升至 4.6GHz，六个性能核心运行于 3.62GHz。相比前代，CPU 性能提升 20%，能效提升 35%，整体功耗降低 16%。

In addition, the OnePlus 15 will also support a 165Hz high refresh rate screen and showcased the debut of its 165-frame gaming ecosystem at the "OnePlus Gaming Conference 2025", positioning itself as a high-performance flagship. 此外，一加 15 还将支持 165Hz 高刷屏，并在「一加游戏大会 2025」上展示了首发的 165 帧游戏生态，定位高性能旗舰。

item.title: 腾讯开源「混元图像 3.0」，对标业界领先闭源模型
item.guid: 腾讯开源「混元图像-3.0」，对标业界领先闭源模型
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent Hunyuan officially released and open-sourced its native multimodal image generation model "HunyuanImage 3.0", with a parameter scale of up to 80B. 昨天，腾讯混元正式发布并开源原生多模态生图模型「混元图像 3.0（HunyuanImage 3.0）」，参数规模高达 80B。

According to the introduction, this is the first open-source industrial-grade native multimodal image generation model, and currently the most effective and largest open-source image generation model in terms of parameters, with performance comparable to leading closed-source models in the industry. 据介绍，这是首个开源工业级原生多模态生图模型，也是目前效果最强、参数量最大的开源生图模型，效果对标业界头部闭源模型。

HunyuanImage 3.0 has significantly improved in semantic understanding, aesthetic quality, and reasoning capabilities, capable of parsing complex semantics up to thousands of characters and generating high-quality images. 混元图像 3.0 在语义理解、美学质感和推理能力上均有显著提升，能够解析千字级复杂语义并生成高质感图像。

Unlike traditional multi-model combination solutions, HunyuanImage 3.0 adopts a native multimodal architecture, capable of completing multimodal input and output for text, images, videos, and audio within a single model. 与传统多模型组合方案不同，混元图像 3.0 采用原生多模态架构，可在单一模型内完成文字、图片、视频与音频等多模态输入输出。

The official statement indicates that the model not only possesses drawing capabilities but also the common sense and reasoning abilities of a language model. For example, by inputting the prompt "generate a four-panel popular science comic about a total lunar eclipse", the model can independently generate a complete comic without requiring frame-by-frame descriptions. 官方表示，该模型不仅具备绘画能力，还拥有语言模型的常识与推理能力。例如输入提示词「生成一个月全食的四格科普漫画」，模型即可自主生成完整漫画，无需逐格描述。

Furthermore, HunyuanImage 3.0 excels in scenarios such as text generation, complex poster design, and comic illustration, capable of meeting the diverse needs of illustrators, designers, and content creators, significantly boosting creative efficiency. 此外，混元图像 3.0 在文字生成、复杂海报设计、漫画插画等场景中表现突出，能够满足插画师、设计师及内容创作者的多样化需求，大幅提升创作效率。

Currently, the open version only supports text-to-image functionality; capabilities such as image-to-image, image editing, and multi-round interaction will be gradually launched later. 目前开放的版本仅支持文生图功能，图生图、图像编辑、多轮交互等能力将在后续逐步上线。

Users can access the Tencent Hunyuan official website on their computers to experience the model]( https://hunyuan.tencent.com/image) to experience the model), and the model weights and accelerated versions have been simultaneously launched on open-source communities like Github and Hugging Face, available for free download and use by both enterprises and individual developers. 用户可通过电脑端访问 腾讯混元官网 体验该模型]( https://hunyuan.tencent.com/image)体验该模型)，模型权重与加速版本已同步上线 Github、Hugging Face 等开源社区，企业与个人开发者均可免费下载使用。

💻 Github: https://github.com/Tencent-Hunyuan/HunyuanImage-3.0 💻 Github： https://github.com/Tencent-Hunyuan/HunyuanImage-3.0

🤗 Hugging Face: https://huggingface.co/tencent/HunyuanImage-3.0 🤗 Hugging Face： https://huggingface.co/tencent/HunyuanImage-3.0

item.title: 韩国最大外卖平台接入支付宝和微信支付
item.guid: 韩国最大外卖平台接入支付宝和微信支付
item.description:
According to South Korean media "Asia Economy", the South Korean food delivery platform "배달의민족 (Baedal Minjok, abbreviated as Baemin)" recently announced its official integration with WeChat Pay and Alipay. 据韩国媒体《亚洲经济》报道，日前，韩国外卖平台「배달의민족（Baedal Minjok，简称 Baemin）」宣布正式接入微信支付与支付宝。

Operator Woowa Brothers stated that this move aims to enhance the convenience for foreign tourists using food delivery services in Korea. 运营方 Woowa Brothers 表示，此举旨在提升外国游客在韩使用外卖服务的便利性。

According to data from the Korea Tourism Organization, the number of foreign tourists entering the country in the first half of this year reached 8.83 million, a year-on-year increase of 14.6%. It is expected that the total number of visitors to Korea will exceed 20 million next year. 韩国观光公社数据显示，今年上半年入境外国游客已达 883 万人，同比增加 14.6%。预计明年访韩游客总数将突破 2000 万人。

Meanwhile, starting from September 29, group tourists from mainland China (three or more people) can enjoy a temporary visa-free policy, which is expected to further boost tourism demand from Asian countries. 与此同时，自 9 月 29 日起，中国大陆三人及以上团队游客可享受临时免签政策，预计将进一步推动来自亚洲国家的旅游需求。

Baemin has supported international credit card payments since March last year. Data shows that in April this year, non-member international credit card transaction volume increased by approximately 14 times year-on-year. Baemin 自去年 3 月起已支持境外信用卡支付，数据显示，今年 4 月非会员境外信用卡交易量同比增长约 14 倍。

Ko Myung-seok, head of the Woowa Brothers platform, stated: "By introducing convenient global payment services, we hope to enable more and more foreign tourists to experience Korea's delivery culture without barriers. In the future, we will gradually evaluate multilingual support and continuously enhance user experience." Woowa Brothers 平台负责人高明锡表示：「通过引入全球便捷支付服务，我们希望让越来越多的外国游客能够无障碍地体验韩国的外卖文化。未来还将逐步评估多语言支持，持续提升用户体验。」

item.title: Alo 携手 NBA 球星 Jimmy Butler 推出首款联名球鞋
item.guid: Alo-携手-NBA-球星-Jimmy-Butler-推出首款联名球鞋
item.description:
Recently, athleisure brand Alo announced a collaboration with NBA star Jimmy Butler to launch the brand's first-ever co-branded sneakers, "Alo Recovery Mode x Jimmy Butler." 近日，运动休闲品牌 Alo 宣布与 NBA 球星 Jimmy Butler 合作，推出品牌史上首双联名球鞋「Alo Recovery Mode x Jimmy Butler」。

It is reported that this shoe model is an improved version based on Alo's Recovery Mode launched in 2024, featuring a white vegan leather upper with a caramel-colored rubber sole, and incorporating Butler's designed embossed Monogram elements. 据悉，这款鞋型基于 Alo 于 2024 年推出的 Recovery Mode 改良而来，采用白色纯素皮革鞋面搭配焦糖色胶底，并加入 Butler 设计的浮雕 Monogram 元素。

According to the official introduction, the shoe focuses on post-game recovery functions, equipped with high-rebound foam insoles, with recycled materials used in the upper, and the outsole passing wear resistance tests. 官方介绍称，该鞋款主打赛后恢复功能，配备高回弹泡棉鞋垫，鞋面部分使用回收物料，外底通过耐磨测试。

Jimmy Butler stated in an interview: "These shoes are my go-to after a game when I'm brewing coffee, playing dominoes, relaxing, or spending time with family and friends. I'm very happy to be able to incorporate personal elements into the design." Jimmy Butler 在接受采访时表示：「这双鞋是我比赛后煮咖啡、打骨牌、放松，或陪伴家人朋友时的首选。能在设计中加入个人元素，我感到非常开心。」

The new product will be available for limited release starting October 1st on the Alo official website and at select stores including Beverly Hills, Valley Fair, and Miami Design District. 新品将于 10 月 1 日起在 Alo 官网及 Beverly Hills、Valley Fair、Miami Design District 等指定门店限量发售。

item.title: 《穿越火线-枪战王者》鸿蒙版正式上线：支持跨平台匹配、资产保留
item.guid: 《穿越火线-枪战王者》鸿蒙版正式上线：支持跨平台匹配、资产保留
item.description:
Huawei HarmonyOS Developer's official Weibo announced today that the HarmonyOS version of Tencent's mobile game "CrossFire-King of Guns" has been officially launched, supporting cross-platform matchmaking battles, and the "Fengshen Frenzy" challenge mode is also open. 华为 HarmonyOS 开发者官方微博今日宣布，腾讯手游《穿越火线-枪战王者》鸿蒙版正式上线，支持跨平台匹配对战，同时「封神狂潮」挑战玩法同步开放。

Currently, players can go to the HarmonyOS 5 Huawei Game Center to download and experience it. 目前，玩家可前往 HarmonyOS 5 华为游戏中心下载体验。

According to the introduction, HarmonyOS players can engage in cross-platform matchmaking with Android and iOS users. All game assets from the original Android account (including weapons, characters, progress, etc.) can be fully retained, with no need to re-register an account. 据介绍，鸿蒙系统玩家可与安卓、iOS 平台用户进行跨平台匹配，原安卓账号的所有游戏资产（包括武器、角色、进度等）均可完整保留，无需重新注册账号。

According to the introduction, this version also adds several optimization features: 据介绍，此次版本还新增了多项优化功能：

    [Focus Mode]: The system intelligently allocates computing resources to improve frame rate stability and touch response speed.

    [Shader Preloading]: Preloading can significantly reduce stuttering caused by resource loading.

The official statement indicates that the HarmonyOS version will continue to bring more adaptations and optimizations in the future. 官方表示，未来鸿蒙版将持续带来更多适配与优化。

Previously, at the Huawei Mate XTs Ultimate Master and All-Scenario New Product Launch on September 4, Richard Yu, Huawei's Executive Director and CEO of Consumer Business Group, revealed that the number of HarmonyOS 5 devices has exceeded 14 million, and announced that multiple games, including "League of Legends Mobile," "Delta Force," and "CrossFire," will successively land on the HarmonyOS platform. 此前，在 9 月 4 日的华为 Mate XTs 非凡大师及全场景新品发布会上，华为常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东曾透露，HarmonyOS 5 终端设备数已突破 1400 万，并宣布包括《英雄联盟手游》《三角洲行动》《穿越火线》等多款游戏将陆续登陆鸿蒙平台。

item.title: 《狂野时代》官宣定档 11 ⽉ 22 ⽇
item.guid: 《狂野时代》官宣定档-11-⽉-22-⽇
item.description:
The art film "Wild Times" officially announced today that it will be released in China on November 22. 艺术电影《狂野时代》今日正式宣布将于 11 月 22 日在国内上映。

The film is directed by Bi Gan, starring Jackson Yee and Shu Qi, with Mark Chao as a special guest star, Li Gengxi as a special appearance, and Huang Jue and Chen Yongzhong also featuring. 影片由导演毕赣执导，易烊千玺、舒淇领衔主演，赵又廷特邀出演，李庚希特别出演，黄觉、陈永忠参演。

It is reported that "Wild Times" previously premiered in France on May 22, 2025, and won a Special Award in the main competition unit of the 78th Cannes Film Festival. 据悉，《狂野时代》此前已于 2025 年 5 月 22 日在法国首映，并在第 78 届戛纳电影节主竞赛单元中斩获特别奖。

The film's genres cover drama, sci-fi, and suspense, with the "Soul Snatcher" imagery appearing in the release poster sparking heated discussion among audiences. The official introduction states that the film uses a unique visual language to showcase the theme of "destiny's carving and release." 影片类型涵盖剧情、科幻与悬疑，定档海报中出现的「迷魂者」意象引发观众热议。官方介绍称，影片通过独特的视觉语言展现「命运雕刻与释放」的主题。

item.title: 《蜡笔小新》新剧场版确认引进
item.guid: 《蜡笔小新》新剧场版确认引进
item.description:
The animated film "Crayon Shin-chan: Hot Spring! The Dancer of Kasukabe" was officially announced today for release in mainland China, scheduled to hit theaters in 2025. 动画电影《蜡笔小新：灼热的春日部舞者》今日正式官宣引进内地，将于 2025 年在中国上映。

The film tells the story of the Kasukabe Defense Force, who travel overseas after winning a dance competition, only to be embroiled in a series of crises due to a mysterious "nose backpack." Shin-chan and his friends will embark on a new journey on the big screen, combining hilarious singing and dancing with a magnificent adventure. 影片讲述春日部防卫队因舞蹈比赛获胜而前往海外，却因神秘「鼻子背包」卷入一连串危机。小新与伙伴们将在大银幕上展开一场融合爆笑唱跳与华丽冒险的全新旅程。

It is reported that this film's genres include animation, family, comedy, and musical elements, continuing the series' consistent lighthearted and joyful atmosphere. 据悉，本片类型涵盖动画、家庭、喜剧与音乐元素，延续了系列一贯的轻松欢乐氛围。

The official statement indicates that audiences will unlock a brand new chapter of stories alongside the Kasukabe Defense Force. 官方表示，观众将与春日部防卫队一同解锁全新的故事篇章。

item.title: 《火种》定档 10 月 16 日
item.description:
The major revolutionary historical film "Sparks," directed by Chen Jianfei, written by Zhou Zhentian, and starring Fu Dalong and Jiang Wu, officially announced its release date today. It will be screened nationwide through People's Cinema Line starting October 16. 由陈剑飞执导、周振天编剧，富大龙、姜武领衔主演的重大革命历史题材电影《火种》今日官宣定档，将于 10 月 16 日起通过人民院线在全国上映。

The film focuses on the life-and-death confrontation between Li Dazhao (played by Fu Dalong), a pioneer of the Chinese communist movement, and Wu Yuwen (played by Jiang Wu), head of the Detective Department of the Beijing Police Bureau under the Beiyang Government. Using a dual-timeline narrative, it depicts two capture operations spanning 24 years, reflecting the intense clash between faith and betrayal, ideals and crimes. 影片聚焦中国共产主义运动先驱李大钊（富大龙 饰）与北洋政府京师警察厅侦缉处处长吴郁闻（姜武 饰）之间的生死对决，以双时空叙事展现两场跨越 24 年的抓捕行动，折射出信仰与背叛、理想与罪行的激烈碰撞。

The film is jointly produced by Hainan Broadcasting Film and Television Media Group and others. It aims to lead audiences to revisit the light of faith from a century ago, combining profound thought with visual impact. 影片由海南广播电影电视传媒集团等联合出品，将以思想深度与视觉冲击并重的方式，带领观众重温百年前的信仰之光。
